entry.title: FOG ADVISORY , Red Deer
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:17 AM MDT Wednesday 15 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Fog, -15.4°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Red Deer Regional Airport 09:26 AM MDT Wednesday 15 March 2023
Condition: Fog
Temperature: -15.4°C
Pressure: 101.6 kPa
Visibility: 0.6 km
Humidity: 84 %
Wind Chill: -18
Dewpoint: -17.5°C
Wind: WSW 4 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 5

entry.title: Wednesday: Fog dissipating. High minus 5.
entry.summary: Fog dissipating this morning then sunny. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud this afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 5. Wind chill minus 25 this morning and minus 8 this afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 07:35 AM MDT Wednesday 15 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 12. POP 40%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries. Fog patches developing this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 12. Wind chill near minus 18. Forecast issued 07:35 AM MDT Wednesday 15 March 2023
